page.title: 15Entertainment
page.content: The biggest theatre is the Barbican near Moorgate station. It was built just a few years ago. It is the home for the Royal Shakespear Company which used to be at the Aldwych in the Strand. On level 1 there is a small theatre called the Pit also run by the RSC. Finally there are two cinemas and a large concert hall. The half-Moon theatre is in Mile End road near Stepney Green Station. In Commercial Road is the Palaseum Cinema; it is on the opposite of Sidney Street and shows mainly Asian Films.
